markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wind Jump](/Feats.aspx?ID=466) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=112" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 163 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
ki spells

</column>

---

You gather the wind beneath you, allowing you to soar as you jump. You gain the [_wind jump_](/Spells.aspx?ID=490) ki spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.
name: Wind Jump
